definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Jos 15:9, Jos 15:10, Jos 15:11, Jos 15:29, 1Ch 13:6 = [[קִרְיַת בַּעַל]] Jos 15:60, Jos 18:14 (city of Baal, from a high place of Baal there) = [[בַּעֲלֵי יְהוּדָה]] 2Sa 6:2 (We Dr read [[בעל]]; [[י]] added by dittogr.; so-called as seat of Baal-worship in Judah, in distinct. fr. like places elsewhere) = [[קִרְיַת יְעָרִים]] Jos 9:17 v. Jos 15:9, 1Ch 13:6; a city of Judah; ? Kirjat el‘ EnabRob:BR ii. 11 Tristr:Tpg.
